title: Borderlands 3 Detailed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.29.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Get your trial set at http://harrys.com/gamesdaily

Fran and Imran Khan from Game Informer discuss Borderland 3's reveal, Borderlands: Game of the Year and a Nintendo hack! 

Time Stamps - 
00:01:33 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny World Tour comes to Kansas City THIS Saturday. Come hang out with us all day at Planet Comicon for panels with the cast of Smallville, Mick Foley, and Henry Winkler! Then, come to our Meet & Greet at the Flying Saucer Draught Emporium! No badge needed for the Meet & Greet. NYC, you’re next on April 6th!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Tom Bock, and Mohammed Mohammed!
The Roper Report   -
00:03:53 - Borderlands 3 Announced
00:14:46 - Borderlands: Game of the Year Edition
00:26:06 - Bulletstorm Coming To Switch
00:30:28 - Security Researcher Hacks Into Microsoft and Nintendo
00:36:20 - Out today
00:44:00 -  Quip
00:45:11 -  Harry’s
Reader mail   -
00:46:39 - “Do you think we will ever get Borderlands or any of it's sequels on the Switch?” - TheSheepWhisper
00:51:05 - “Why was the Gearbox Panel so cringey?” - Alec Bobko
00:55:27 - “Have either of you had to stop playing a game or downright avoided a game from the start because of something emotionally significant?” - Alex
00:58:09 - Squad Up: Georgie - Xbox One - Architek0fDeath
00:59:20 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Host:
MONDAY: Greg & Tim
TUESDAY: Greg & Capitalist Pig
WEDNESDAY: Greg & Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg & Andrea
FRIDAY: Fran & Andrea
